articles.description: The mayor of Jasper said the wildfire  "ravaged our small, tight-knit mountain community".
articles.title: 'Monster' wildfire may have destroyed up to 50% of town of Jasper

articles.description: Fire crews are taking advantage of the pause from hot and dry conditions to battle the still out-of-control blaze.
articles.title: Rain and cooler weather bring relief from Jasper fire

articles.description: The National Wax Museum say it will remake a waxwork of the late Irish singer after an unveiling.
articles.title: Dublin wax museum removes Sinéad O'Connor figure after criticism

articles.title: Barack Obama endorses Kamala Harris for president

articles.description: The ruling ends a lawsuit filed by a man who fell ill after swallowing a piece of bone from his boneless order.
articles.title: Boneless chicken wings can have bones, Ohio court rules

articles.title: Sabotage on the rails jeopardises big day for Paris

articles.title: Hockey star Matt Dawson amputates finger to play at Olympics

articles.description: The 72-year-old South African was convicted for seven apartheid-era murders but was behind many more deaths.
articles.title: South African killer Louis van Schoor dies as victims still demand justice
